description:
Designed to keep a little one supported with their head above water. The collar supports your baby’s head, while adjustable shoulder buckles and a leg buckle secure the PFD in place. An adjustable waist strap and webbing harness add security and comfort.

  • Polyester shell
  • 3 buckles: 1 between legs, 2 at shoulder straps make it easy to remove
  • Adjustable strap around waist
  • 3-piece collar design contours around baby’s head for upright support
  • Adjustable fabric and webbing harness
  • Note that this PFD is not Transport Canada approved since there is currently no testing standard to certify PFDs for children under 9kg
  • Manufacturer's recommended weight range is 4 to 12kg
name: Level Six Puffer PFD - Infants
